long_description: Bring just the essentials on your next day trip with the Victorinox Orbital Waist Pack. Spacious main compartment and zippered front pocket. Padded back panel maximizes comfort. Adjustable waist strap secures with buckle closure. Constructed of robust nylon fabric, sturdy reverse-coil zippers and wear-and-tear resistant Hypalon(R) zipper pulls.
short_description: Bring just the essentials on your next day trip with the Victorinox Orbital Waist Pack.
